snippet: Penske Racing will take A. J. Allmendinger to Long Beach, Calif., without a sponsor to give him more seat time before the Indianapolis 500.
lead_paragraph: Penske Racing will take A. J. Allmendinger to Long Beach, Calif., without a sponsor to give him more seat time before the Indianapolis 500.

headline.seo: A.J. Allmendinger to Run Long Beach for Penske
headline.main: Allmendinger to Run Long Beach for Penske
